game_description: Math World VR combines fun games with simple math to exercise the brain! This STEM Accredited VR game consists of 12 fun mini-games for all ages to enjoy! Who said brain exercise can't be fun? *Axe Throwing *Bow & Arrow *Basketball Free Throw *Punch The Plates *Number Slicer *Baseball Throw *Target Marksman *Carnival Darts *Frisbee Toss *Mini-Golf *Multiples Paintball *Slingshot Each mini game in Math World VR combines simple math that adds a fun challenge. Whether it's axe throwing, even/odds with throwing darts at balloons, or shooting a bow and arrow at the correct answer for the equation, you'll have countless hours of fun - all while helping improve your math arithmetic and exercise your brain! Math World VR can be played stationary.
review_1: This game is fun to play with the fam! Could have difficulty levels, but otherwise it's a fun game!
review_2: My son has so much fun on this app he hardly realizes he’s studying!
review_3: This is a great game for elementary school kids starting to learn math. My nephew had a blast playing. Even as an adult the mini games are a lot of fun (I especially liked the basketball game).
review_4: I just pushed the update and now I can’t cast in order to watch my child’s progress. Why was casting removed from app?
